how can a developer test calling using twilio? it says i "need a sales hub account". don't i have one as a dev?

I am integrating with HubSpot and using the API to create Deals and then add Deal associations. I recently saw that HubSpot updated their company associations so that you can no associate multiple companies to a single deal. In this article: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/crm-setup/associations-enhancements-beta#opt-in-for-associations-improvements>

there is a paragraph for "Manage company associations" that reads:
> By default, the first company you associate with a record will be the primary company.
However, in my testing, I noticed that the first company association (via api) is not the primary company. The second company I am associated with the Deal is showing "primary" in the UI.  This seems like a bug to me.
I am hesitant to change my order of operations since, if it is a bug, then when the bug is fixed, my data will be wrong (swapped).
Can someone confirm if this is indeed a bug with the api, where first company associated deal is not tagged as primary?
